message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
